title: 🍃 Verbena Harvest 🌿
description: A refreshing herbal tea made with verbena leaves.

steps.instruction: While on the branch, spray leaves with water to remove dust.  Wait for it to dry.
Once dry, cut branches or pick leaves
Strip leaves from branches and place in a bowl.
Place leaves on table cloth to dry (do not use vinyl)
Flip on table cloth until its really crispy

notes: Verbena is a great antioxidant and can be used in many recipes.  Great before sleep and for stomach ache.
memory: The aroma of drying verbena fills the kitchen with a sense of calm.
author: Meme
